titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning royall mynes.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Procedures and requirement for obtaining leases to find and work silver and other mines--STC.
Dated at end: Wansteede, the tenth day of Iuly, in the two and twentieth yeere of our reigne ..
Arms 12; Steele notation: opi- and 2) same for.
